src_text: morwa wa mohammed yo a nago le mengwaga ye šupa le yena diteko di laeditše gore o na le baerase ye.
tgt_text: indodana kamohammed eneminyaka eyisikhombisa ubudala nayo ihlonzwe njengenegciwane.

src_text: ka morago ga gore diteko di laetše gore o na le baerase ye, boraro bja bona ka moka ba ile ba ipeela thoko ka gae gore ba se kopane le batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: emva kokuhlonzwa njengezisulu zegciwane lecorona, bobathathu babe sebehlala ngabodwana khona ekhaya labo.

src_text: "re ile ra ipeela thoko ka phapošing ya rena ya go robalela, mola e le gore matswale yena – yo a nago le bolwetši bja swikiri le bolwetši bja madi a magolo ka mahlatse a se a fetelwa ke baerase ye – a ile a hlokomela bana ba rena ba babedi," gwa bolela mohammed.
tgt_text: "besihleli ngasodwana emagunjini ethu okulala, ngesikhathi umamezala wami onesifo sikashukela kanye nomfutho wegazi ophakeme kuyabongeka ukuthi yena akazange wesuleleka ngaleli gciwane – unakekele laba bantwana abanye ababili," kusho umohammed.

src_text: go ya ka kgoro ya maphelo ya kapa bodikela, batho bao ba nago le bolwetši bja madi a magolo, ba bolwetši bja swikiri le ba bolwetši bja dipshio bja go se fole ke bao ka tllwaelo ba tshenywago ke covid19.
tgt_text: ngokomnyango wezempilo wasentshonalanga kapa, abantu abanesifo somfutho wegazi, isifo sikashukela kanye nesifo esiyimbelesela sezinso bangabanye babantu abalinyazwa kakhulu yicovid19.

src_text: go thoma ka la 25 mopitlo, batho bao ba nago le malwetši ao a latelago a go iphihla ba laeditše maswao a kotsi: bolwetši bja madi a magolo, 58% bolwetši bja swikiri, 56% bolwetši bja dipshio bja go se fole, 17% hiv , 16% asema goba bolwetši bja go hema bja go se fole, 15% bolwetši bja pelo, 11% mmele o mogolo, 13% tb, 13% kankere, 2% malwetši a mangwe a go se fole, 16%.
tgt_text: mhla zingama25 kunhlaba, abantu abanalezi zifo ezilandelayo batshengise izimpawu ezibucayi kakhulu: isifo somfutho wegazi, amaphesenti angama58 isifo sikashukela, amaphesenti angama56 isifo esiyimbelesela sezinso, amaphesenti ayi17 isandulela ngculazi, amaphesenti ayi16 isifuba somoya noma izifo eziyimbelelsela zokuphefumula, amaphesenti ayi15 isifo senhliziyo, amaphesenti ayi11 ukukhuluphala ngokweqile, amaphesenti ayi13 isifo sofuba, amaphesenti ayi13 isifo somdlavuza, amaphesenti amabili okunye ukugula okuyimbelesela, amaphesenti ayi16.

src_text: mohammed o bolela gore letšhogo la gagwe le legolo e bile ge a hlakahlakana a palelwa ke go hema ka lebaka la covid19.
tgt_text: umohammed uthi ukwesaba kwakhe okukhulu kwakulele ekuhlangabezaneni nezimo ezinzima zokuphefumula ngenxa yecovid19.

src_text: "ke ile ka itemogela go lapa, go gohlola le go ngangega ga maswafo, fao go ilego gwa rarollwa ke pompi ya ka ya asema.
tgt_text: "ngihlangabezane nokuhlala ngikhathele, ukukhwehlela kanye nokucinana kwesifuba, nokuye kwaxazululwa yisifutho sami sesifuba somoya.

src_text: maswao a ka ga se a mpefala go swana le a monna wa ka, yo a ilego a ba le dihlabi mmeleng, a sellega, a ba le maswafo a go ngangega, go felelwa ke moya, disaenase tše di thibanego, sehuba se sekoto mafahleng a gagwe le go ﬁ ša ga mmele.
tgt_text: izimpawu zokugula kwami bezingebucayi njengezomkhwenyana wami, obenezinhlungu umzimba wonke, ucanucanu, ukucinana kwesifuba, ukuphefumula kanzima, ukuvaleka kwamakhala, izikhwehlela esifubeni kanye nemfiva.

src_text: morwa wa ka o bile le go ﬁ ša ga mmele matšatši a mararo, eupša o ile a fola ka pela kudu ge a se na go fenya maswao a gagwe," a realo.
tgt_text: indodana yami yabanjwa imfiva izinsuku ezintathu, kodwa iye yalulama ngokuphuthuma emva kokunqoba lezi zimpawu zakhe," kusho yena.

src_text: ba lapa la bo mohammed ba ile ba obamela ditshepedišo ka moka tša pabalelo ya maphelo ka mošomong le ka gae, go efoga gore ba se ke ba fetelwa ke baerase.
tgt_text: umndeni kamohammed ubuyilandela ngendlela yonke imithetho yenhlanzeko emsebenzini kanye nasekhaya, ukugwema ukwesulelana ngaleli gciwane.

src_text: "ba lapa la ka ba be ba kwešiša, ba kgathala ebile ba na le thekgo, gomme ba re tlišetša dijo tša mantšiboa bošegong bjo bongwe le bjo bongwe, eupša ka dinako tše dingwe setšhaba sa geno se ka no se kgathale ka wena gomme tshenyo ye e bakwago ke kgašo ya setšhaba e a tšhoša," gwa bolela mohammed.
tgt_text: "umndeni wami ubuqonda, uzinakekela futhi wesekana, futhi ubusilethela ukudla kwakusihlwa, kodwa kwesinye isikhathi umphakathi wakho ungekhombise ukunakekela futhi nobuhlungu obenziwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuyethusa," kusho umohammed.

src_text: kgoro ya maphelo ya kapa bodikela e bolela gore go dula o nwele meetse le go hlokomela tlelukhose ya gago ya ka mading le thempheretšha ya mmeleng go bohlokwa go laola covid19, kudukudu go balwetši bao ba nago le malwetši a go iphihla.
tgt_text: umnyango wezempilo wasentshonalanga kapa uthi ukuphuza amanzi ngokwanele kanye nokubheka izinga likashukela wakho egazini, umfutho wegazi kanye nokubheka izinga lokushisa iyona ndlela yokulawula icovid19, ikakhulukazi kubantu abanezifo eziyimbelesela.

src_text: godimo ga fao, kgoro ye e eletša batho bao ba nago le malwetši a go iphihla: go nwa dihlare ka maleba, go ya ka fao ba laetšwego ke mošomi wa tlhokomelo ya maphelo.
tgt_text: ukwengeza, umnyango weluleka abantu abanezifo eziyimbelesela ukuthi: badle imithi yabo yokwelashwa ngendlela eyiyo, njengoba kusho ungoti wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

src_text: go hlapa diatla tša bona ka sesepa le meetse bonyane metsotswana ye 20, pele ga ge o ka kgoma dihlare.
tgt_text: bahlanze izandla zabo ngensipho namanzi okungenani imizuzwana engama20, ngaphambi kokuba bathinte imithi.

src_text: go se emiši go nwa dihlare ka ntle le ge mošomi wa tlhokomelo ya maphelo a go botša gore o emiše go di nwa ebile o se fane ka dihlare tšeo le motho yo mongwe.
tgt_text: bangalinge bayeke ukudla imithi yokwelashwa ngaphandle uma kusho ungoti wezokunakekelwa kwempilo futhi bangabelani namuntu imithi yabo.

src_text: go leka go itšhidulla metsotso ye 30 ka letšatši.
tgt_text: bazame ukuvocavoca umzimba imizuzu engama30 ngosuku.

src_text: kgoro e bolela gore batho bao ba nago le bolwetši bja swikiri ba na le sebaka se segolo sa go itemogela go hlakahlakana ga bolwetši ka lebaka la covid19, eupša kotsi ya go babja kudu e fasana ge e le gore bolwetši bja swikiri bja motho bo laolega gabotse.
tgt_text: umnyango uthi abantu abanesifo sikashukela banamathuba aphezulu okuhlangabezana nezimo zokugula okuqhamuka necovid19, kodwa ubungozi bokuthi lowo muntu angagcina egula kakhulu buncane uma nje izinga lakhe likashukela lilawuleka ngendlela eyiyo.

src_text: "ka kakaretšo, batho bao ba nago le bolwetši bja swikiri go na le kgonagalo ye kgolo ya go itemogela maswao ao a mpefetšego kudu le go hlakahlakana ga bolwetši ge ba ka fetelwa ke baerase ye.
tgt_text: "ngokuvamile, abantu abanesifo sikashukela yibona abasemathubeni amaningi okuthi bahlangabezane nezimpawu ezibucayi kanye nobunzima uma besuleleke ngegciwane lecorona.

src_text: ka ge batho bao ba nago le bolwetši bja swikiri ba le kotsing ye kgolo ya gore covid19 e ka mpefala, go tšwela pele go tlogela sekgoba gareng ga batho go a šišinywa ge go kgonagala.
tgt_text: njengoba abantu abanesifo sikashukela besengcupheni enkulu yezimpawu ezibucayi zecovid19, ukuziqhelelanisa kubantu kuyagqugquzelwa lapho kungenzeka khona.

src_text: go ba le mmele o mogolo le gona go kotsi gore covid19 e ka mpefala.
tgt_text: ukukhuluphala ngokweqile nakho kunobungozi bezimpawu ezibucayi zecovid19.

src_text: go sesefala mmeleng, ge go kgonagala, ka fao go a šišinywa.
tgt_text: ukwehla emzimbeni, lapho kungenzeka khona, kuyagqugquzelwa.

src_text: "go phela gabotse mmelengka morago ga go dula a nnoši mo matšatšing a 14, mohammed o ile a boela mošomong.
tgt_text: "ukuba ngumqemaneemva kokuba ehlaliswe yedwana izinsuku ezi14, umohammed wabuyela emsebenzini.

src_text: o bolela gore go fola go baerase ye go ile gwa fetoša ka fao a naganago ka gona le ka fao a bonago bophelo ka gona.
tgt_text: uthi ukwelulama kuleli gciwane kushintshe indlela acabanga ngayo futhi abona ngayo impilo.

src_text: "o bona bohlokwa bja ba lapa la gago le dilo tše nnyane bophelong.
tgt_text: "uwubonga kakhulu umndeni wakho kanye nezinto ezincane empilweni.

src_text: ke nyaka batho ka seemong sefe goba sefe sa mošomo go rwala maikarabelo go maphelo a bona le go ruta ba malapa a bona le bana ba bona, kudukudu ka gore mo lebakeng le bana ba boetše sekolong.
tgt_text: ngiyafisa sengathi abantu kunoma yiyiphi indawo yokusebenza bengathatha isibopho ngempilo yabo futhi bafundise imindeni yabo kanye nabantwana, ikakhulukazi njengoba abantwana sebebuyele esikoleni.

src_text: "thuša ngwana wa gago go hwetša ditsela tša boithomelo tša go laetša lerato go bagwera ba gagwe, ka ntle le go batamela le go kgoma batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: "siza umntwana wakho ukuthi athole izindlela ezintsha zokutshengisa uthando ebanganini babo, ngaphandle kokusondelana kanye nokuthintana nabo.

src_text: botša ba lapa la gago gore ba tloše ditwatši go bona pele ga ge ba tsena ka gae, tlogela dieta tša gago ka karatšheng ge o ka kgona, apola diaparo tša gago ka moka gomme o hlape mmele pele ga ge o dumediša ba lapa la gago gomme o hlokomele tša maphelo kudu gore o ba šireletše," a realo.
tgt_text: yenza ukuthi umndeni wakho ubulale amagciwane ngaphambi kokuba ungene endlini, shiya izicathulo egalaji uma kufanele, khumula zonke izingubo zakho ugeze umzimba ngaphambi kokuba ubingelele umndeni wakho futhi qaphela kakhulu ezempilo ukuze ubavikele," kusho yena.

src_text: kgoro e eletša batho bao ba nago le malwetši a go iphihla go ja dijo tša phepo, ba itšhidulle kgafetšakgafetša, ba laole kgatelelo ya bona ya monagano, ba obamele leano la bona la kalafo ya maphelo le go latela magato ka moka a thibelo ya malwetši.
tgt_text: umnyango weluleke abantu abanezifo eziyimbelesela ukuba badle ukudla okunempilo, bazivocavoce njalo, bakwazi ukulawula ukhwantalala, balandele uhlelo lwemithi yokwelashwa kwabo futhi balandele izinyathelo zokuzivikela ezidingekayo.

src_text: vbolwetši bja madi a magolo ka mahlatse a se a fetelwa ke baerase ye – a ile a hlokomela bana ba rena ba babedi," gwa bolela mohammed.
tgt_text: vonesifo sikashukela kanye nomfutho wegazi ophakeme kuyabongeka ukuthi yena akazange wesuleleka ngaleli gciwane – unakekele laba bantwana abanye ababili," kusho umohammed.

src_text: a fola ka pela kudu ge a se na go fenya maswao a gagwe," a realo.
tgt_text: qile, amaphesenti ayi13 isifo sofuba, amaphesenti ayi13lama ngokuphuthuma emva kokunqoba lezi zimpawu zakhe," kusho yena.

src_text: ba lapa la bo mohammed ba ile ba obamela ditshepedišo ka moka tša pabalelo ya maphelo ka mošomong le ka gae, go efoga gore ba se ke ba fetelwa ke baerase.
tgt_text: umndeni kamohammed ubuyilandela ngendlela yonke imithetho yenhlanzeko emsebenzini kanye nasekhaya, ukugwema ukwesulelana ngaleli gciwane.

src_text: "ba lapa la ka ba be ba kwešiša, ba kgathala ebile ba na le thekgo, gomme ba re tlišetša dijo tša mantšiboa bošegong bjo bongwe le bjo bongwe, eupša ka dinako tše dingwe setšhaba sa geno se ka no insaaf mohammed, yo a nago le asema, o kgonne go fenya covid19 ge e le gore o na le maswao afe goba afe a bolwetši, a go swana le go ﬁ ša ga mmele, go gohlola, goba go felelwa ke moya, ikgokaganye le mogala wa go se lefelwe wa covid19 mo go 0800 029 999 goba romela lentšu le ‘hi’ go 0600 123 456
tgt_text: umama onesifo esiyimbelesela unqobe icovid19 silusapho nyanda uinsaaf mohammed uthi kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi abantu baseningizimu afrika ikakhulukazi labo abanezifo eziyimbelesela bazibophezele empilweni yabo.

src_text: re gopola bašomedi ba rena ba tlhokomelo ya maphelo vukuzenzele unnamed palo ya moragorago ya mahu a go hlolwa ke coronavirus e fetile 2 000. godimo go bao ba lobilego maphelo a bona ke bašomedi ba tša maphelo, ditsebi tša go hloka bosodi mešomong ya bona bao ba hlokometšego bao ba lwalago, ebile e be e le bona ba thekgago le go homotša bao ba lego maokelong ba beetšwe thoko le ba malapa a bona.
tgt_text: amazwi okuhlonipha abasebenzi basemkhakheni wezempilo vukuzenzele unnamed isibalo sakamuva sabantu asebedlulile emhla beni ngenxa yegciwane lecorona sesevile kuzi2000.

src_text: gore banna le basadi bao ba rwelego mošomo wo o bohlokwa wa go kgethega magetleng a bona ke bona bao ba fetelwago ke bolwetši bjo le go hlokagala ke taba ye hlobaetšago kudu.
tgt_text: phakathi kwalabo abadlulile emhlabeni kubalwa nabasebenzi basemkhakheni wezempilo, ongoti ababenakekela abagulayo, futhi ababeseka baphinde beduduze labo abasezibhedlela beqhelelanisiwe nemindeni yabo.

src_text: ke bona batho ba matho mothomo ba go phenkgišana le leuba le.
tgt_text: ukugula nokudlula emhla beni kwamadoda nabantu besifazane abenza lo msebenzi ohloniphekile noyigugu kangaka kusigqeme inkamba beyibuza.

src_text: ba šoma ka tlase ga kgatelelo ye kgolo ebile ba swanela ke go dula ba tshwenyegile megopolong ka ge ba tseba gore ba kotsing ya go fetelwa ke baerase ye.
tgt_text: yibo abahamba phambili ekulweni nalolu bhubhane.

src_text: ke bagale le bagalegadi ba makgonthe ba phenkgišano ya rena kgahlanong le coronavi rus.
tgt_text: basebenza ngaphansi kwezimo ezinencindezi enkulu futhi bathwala umthwalo owukhathaza kakhulu umqondo ngokwazi ukuthi nabo basengcupheni yokutheleleka ngaleli gciwane.

src_text: re hlompha bagale ba ba maafrika borwa bao ba tlogelago magae a bona, malapa a bona le baratwa ba bona gore ba tle mešomong tšatši ka tšatši ntle le go šitwa ba eya dikliniking, maokelong le mafelong a mangwe a tša maphelo.
tgt_text: bangamaqhawe namaqhawekazi eqiniso kule mpi yethu yokulwa negciwane lecorona .

src_text: gona fao ba fana ka tlhokomelo ya bongaka, thekgo ya tša tsamaišo le ditirelo tše dingwe go swana le go hlwekiša le go fepa batho ka dijo.
tgt_text: sizethulela isigqoko lezi zakhamuzi zaseningizimu afrika ezidela imizi yazo, imi ndeni kanye nabathandiweyo ziye emitholampilo, ezibhedlela nakwezinye izikhungo zezempilo mihla namalanga.

src_text: ge ba le gare ba phethagatša mešomo ya bona ya bokgoni, le rena bjalo ka setšhaba ke mošomo wa rena go ba šireletša le ba malapa a bona.
tgt_text: lapho ezifika zihlinzeke ngemisebenzi yokunakekela ngokwezempilo, ezokusekwa ukuphathwa kwemisebenzi kanye neminye imisebenzi njengokuhlanza nokuhlinzeka ngokudla.

src_text: maphelo le polokego ya bona a swanetše go tla pele.
tgt_text: njengoba zenza imisebenzi yazo ngobungcweti, nathi kumele sizitshathe kanye nemindeni yazo emahlombe ethu.

src_text: re a ba hlompha le go ba thekga bjalo ka banna le basadi bao ba laeditšego gore ba itokišeditše go bea maphelo a bona kotsing gore re tle re kgone go phela.
tgt_text: impilo nokuphepha kwazo kumele kube seqhulwini.

src_text: gore ba kgone go dira mešo mo ya bona ye boimaima ba hloka thekgo le tšhireletšo ya rena ka kabo ya didirišwa tša tšhireletšo ya mmele (dippe).
tgt_text: siyazihlonipha futhi sizihlo ma uphaphe legwalagwala njengamadoda nabantu besifazane ababonakalisa ukuthi bazimisele ukubeka impilo yabo engcupheni ukuze thina sikwazi ukuphila.

src_text: ka thekgo ya sekhwama sa naga le dineelano tša go tšwa go maafrika borwa a mantši o tee ka o tee, dikgwebong, dithe ong le mebušong ye mengwe, re ile ra kgona go rekela bašomi ba ba bogale dippe.
tgt_text: ukuze benze umsebenzi wabo wobuqhawe nobuqhawekazi badinga ukuthi sibeseke futhi sibavikele ngokubahlinzeka ngezinsizakusebenza zokuzivikela (amappe).

src_text: fao go bilego le tlhaelelo ya dippe, maokelo a rena a hlaganela seemo seo ka ponyo ya leihlo go netefatša gore didirišwa tšeo di ba gona.
tgt_text: ngokwesekwa yisikhwama sobunye nobumbano noxhaso oluvela kwizakhamuzi zaseningizimu afrika ezingabantu ngabodwana, amabhizinisi, izinhlangano kanye nabanye ohulumeni, sikwazile ukuthenga izinsizakusebenza zokuzivikela zalaba basebenzi abangamaqhawe namaqhawekazi abahamba phambili kule mpi.

src_text: re tseba gore khumanego ya dippe ga se yona tlhotlo e le noši yeo bašomedi ba tša maphelo ba lebaganego le yona.
tgt_text: lapho okube nokusho da kwamappe, izibhedlela zethu ziyalulungisa lolo daba ngokuphazima kweso ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi ziyatholakala.

src_text: go ralala naga ka bophara, dikliniki le maokelo di lebagane le tlhaelelo ya bašomi.
tgt_text: siyazi ukuthi ukutholakala kwamappe abasebenzi basemkhakheni wezempilo akusiyo kuphela inselele abasebenzi ababhekene nayo.

src_text: bothata bjo bo gare bo a hlaganelwa.
tgt_text: ezweni lonke imitholampilo nezibhedlela zibhekene nokushoda kwabasebenzi.

src_text: go thekga mošomo wo bašo medi ba rena bao e lego ba mathomo ba go lwantšha bolwetši bjo ba o phethagatšago nageng ka bophara re romela ditona le batlatšatona seleteng se se nngwe le se se nngwe sa ka mo nageng go utolla ditlhotlo tša fao go ya ka fao batho ba itemogelago tšona dileteng tšeo le go šoma mmogo le makgotlataolo a profense a tša maphelo.
tgt_text: le nkinga siyayilungisa.

src_text: re swanetše go šoma mmogo go šireletša maphelo a bohle e sego fela a bašomedi ba tša maphelo eupša a bašomedi ka moka.
tgt_text: ukweseka umsebenzi owenziwa ngabasebenzi bethu abahamba phambili kule mpi ezweni lonke, sithume ongqongqoshe namaphini ongqongqoshe esifundeni ngasinye ezweni ukuze baye kobona izingqinamba zakulezi zifunda nokusebenzisana nezikhulu zezempilo zasezifundazweni.

src_text: go šetše go bile le mošomo wa bothakga wo dirilwego ke diyunione go ruta maloko a tšona ka taolo ya go fetelwa ke bolwetši le thibelo gotee le tlhweko.
tgt_text: sidinga ukusebenzisana uku ze sivikele ezempilo zabasebenzi abahamba phambili empini kanye nabasebenzi bonkana.

src_text: tšona diyunione tše di thekga gape mošomo wa kgoro ya mešomo le ya bašomi go swara ditekolo tša mafelo a mešomo go netefatša gore ditshepedišo tša maphelo le tša polokego di a hlongwa go bašomedi bao ba boelago mešomong.
tgt_text: sekunomsebenzi omkhu lu owenziwe izinyunyana ngokufundisa abasebenzi ngezindlela zokulawula ukuthelelana nokuvikela kanye nezenhlanzeko.

src_text: tše ntši tša diyunion e tša bašomi le tšona di fana ka tshedimošo ya coronavirus go maloko a tšona mola bengmešomo ba le gare ka masolo a temošo.
tgt_text: baphinde beseke nomsebenzi womnyango wezabasebenzi nezemisebenzi ekwenzeni umsebenzi wokuhlola ezindaweni zokusebenze la ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi zimisiwe izinhlelo zezempilo nezokuphepha zabasebenzi ababuyela emsebenzini.

src_text: ye nngwe ya dihlotlo tšeo di hlagetšego naga ya gaborena ke ka fao batho bao go hlatsetšwego gore ba nale coronavirus ba tlontlollwago ka gona.
tgt_text: iningi lezinyunyana zethu lihlinzeka ngolwazi ngegciwane lecorona kumalungu azo futhi abase benzi baqhuba imikhankaso yokuqwashisa.

src_text: bjalo ka setšhaba, re nale maikarabelo a mohlakanelwa a go fediša go tlontlollwa ga batho bao ba fetetšwego ke coronavirus .
tgt_text: enye yezinselele eziqubuke ezweni lethu wukubekwa isihlava kwabantu abatholakale benegciwane lecorona .

src_text: go bile le dipego tše hlobaetšago tša ka fao batho ka noši ba hlomarwago go tšwa fao ba tšwago le batho setšhabeng bao ba ipelaetšago kgahlanong le balwetši ba coronavirus ge ba amogelwa maokelong le dikiliniking tša kgauswi le bona.
tgt_text: njengomphakathi, sisonke sinomthwalo wokuqeda isihlava esinamekwe abantu abathe leleke ngegciwane lecorona .

src_text: se se swanetše go fela.
tgt_text: kube nemibiko ephazamisayo ngabantu abahlukumezekile emiphakathini yabo kanye nemiphakathi ebeyibhikisha ilwa nokungeniswa kweziguli ezinegciwane lecorona ezibhedlela nasemitholampilo yasezindaweni abahlala kuzo.

src_text: go swana le ka fao re bilego ngatana ye tee go hlohleletša go amogelwa ga batho bao ba nago le hiv le go ema ka lentšu le tee go lwantšha hlaolo ya bona, re swanetše go laetša kwešišo, kgotlelelo, boleta, kwelano le kwelobohloko go bao ba fetetšwego ke baerase ye le ba malapa a bona.
tgt_text: lokhu kumele kuphele nya.

src_text: gothwe maitshwaro a a go tlontlollwa ga batho a hlohleletšwa ke poifo ya go fetelwa ke bolwetši le go hloka kwešišo.
tgt_text: njengoba sahlangana sakhuthaza ukwamukelwa kwabantu abaphila nehiv futhi samelana nokuhlukunyezwa kwabo, kumele sibonakalise ukuqonda, ukwamukela, ukuba nesihawu, ukukhalisana nokuzwelana nalabo abatheleleke ngaleli gciwane kanye nemindeni yabo.

src_text: tsela ye kaonekaone ya go fenya poifo ya rena ya tlhago ya bolwetši bjo le ya go fetelwa ke go latela ditshepedišo tša hlweko tšeo di lego gona.
tgt_text: kuthiwa lokhu kunameka ngesihlava kudalwa wukwesaba ukutheleleka ngegciwane nokungaqondi.

src_text: poifo ya go fetelwa ke bolwetši go hlatsetšwe gore e gona ebile ke ya makgonthe.
tgt_text: indlela ephuma phambili yokunqoba ukwesaba kwethu ukugula nokutheleleka wukulandela imithetho yezenhlanzeko emisiwe.

src_text: go le bjalo, re tseba seo re swanetšego go se dira go itšhireletša le go šireletša ba bangwe.
tgt_text: ukwesaba ukutheleleka kuyazwakala futhi kuyinto ekhona.

src_text: re tseba gore baerasee ye e hlolwa ke eng le gore re ka dira eng go itšhireletša gore re se fetelwe.
tgt_text: khona manjalo, siyazi ukuthi kumele senzeni ukuze sizivikele thina uqobo kanye nabanye.

src_text: re tseba gabotse gore re swanetše go šielana sekgala, go ipeela thoko le batho ba bangwe ge re kopane le bao ba fetetšwego le go ihlagiša maokelong ge re nale dika tša bolwetši bjo.
tgt_text: siyazi ukuthi yini edala igci wane nokuthi singenzani uku ze sizivikele ekuthelelekeni.

src_text: re swanetše go tšwelapele go hlahlwa ke dintlha tša mannete e sego mabarebare.
tgt_text: siyazi ukuthi kumele siziqhelelani se, sigonqe uma sihlanga bezane nalabo abathelelekile nokuthi siye esibhedlela uma sinezimpawu zokugula.

src_text: nako yela ya gore mang le mang a bolele gore yena ga a tsebe motho yo a fetetšwego goba a amilwego ke coronavirus e fetile kgale.
tgt_text: kumele siqhubeke nokulandela amaqiniso hhayi okungamahlebezi.

src_text: ka nako ye, go feta mehla yohle, bagwera ba rena, ba malapa, bašomimmogo le baagišane ba hloka kwelobohloko le thekgo ya rena.
tgt_text: sesadlula isikhathi lapho sasingathi akekho umuntu esimaziyo otheleleke ngegciwane lecorona .

src_text: mo matšatšing, dibekeng le dikgwedi tše tlago, re tla fela re ikhwetša re hloka tshepho le go boifa ge re bona palo ya bao ba fetetšwego le bao ba hlokagalago e hlatloga.
tgt_text: manje abangani bethu, nemindeni, ozakwethu kanye nomakhelwane bethu badinga ukuhawukelwa nokuthi sibazwele kakhulu kunakuqala.

src_text: go ka direga gore seemo se gakale, eupša re nale bonnete bja gore go tla kaonafala.
tgt_text: ezinsukwini, emasontweni nasezinyangeni eziseza, kuzoba nezikhathi esizozithola sixakekile futhi sesaba njengoba sibona isibalo sabantu abathelelekile nabashonayo sinyuka.

src_text: boramahlale ba rena le baeletši ba dingaka ba re boditše gore kelo ya diphetelo e tla hlatloga ge re batamela nhlorwaneng ya rena ya diphetelo.
tgt_text: kungenzeka ukuthi izinto sezonakele kakhulu, kodwa sinesiqiniseko sokuthi zizoba ngcono.

src_text: eupša nnete ke gore palo ye e tla theogela fase.
tgt_text: ososayensi bethu kanye nabeluleki bezempilo basitshela ukuthi isibalo sabantu abathelelekayo sizonyuka njengoba siya esicongweni sesibalo sabathelelekayo.

src_text: re gopola bašomedi ba rena ba tša maphelo bao ba lobilego maphelo a bona ba hlokometše balwetši.
tgt_text: kodwa sizokwehla nakanjani.

src_text: ge re gopola mediro ya bona, a re netefatšeng gore rena le badudi ba gaborena re bolokegile ka go kgatha tema ya rena.
tgt_text: sihlonipha bonke abasebenzi basemkhakheni wezempilo abadlule emhlabeni ngenxa yokunakekela abagulayo.

src_text: re tla fenya baerase ye le go aga setšhaba ka leswa.
tgt_text: njengoba sibakhumbula, masizigcine thina uqobo kanye nezinye izakhamuzi zakithi ziphephile ngokudlala eyethu indima.

src_text: re fetile mehleng ye boima ebile re fentše go yona.
tgt_text: sizolinqoba leli gciwane bese silakha kabusha izwe lethu.

src_text: a re tieng maatla le hlohleletšo ge re le gare re šoma mmogo go phološa maphelo.
tgt_text: amazwi okuhlonipha abasebenzi basemkhakheni wezempilo vukuzenzele unnamed isibalo sakamuva sabantu asebedlulile emhla beni ngenxa yegciwane lecorona sesevile kuzi2000.

src_text: molemi wa moswa o amogela thekgo ya covid19 silusapho nyanda molemi yo a sa thomago tša temo wa kua kapa bohlabela ke yo mongwe wa bao ba holegilego go tšwa sekhwameng sa mmušo sa kimollo ya coronavirus.
tgt_text: umlimi omncane uthola uxhaso lwecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osafufusa wasempumalanga kapa ungomunye wabahlomule kuxhasomali lukahulumeni lwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka wa mengwaga ye 27 o aga bohwa bja lapa la gabo le lehumo ka go beeletša temong.
tgt_text: unomagcinandile suduka (one minyaka enga ma27) okhulisa ifa lomnde ni wakhe kanye nomcebo ngokutshala izimali zakhe kwezolimo.

src_text: mong wa kgwebo ya 4 u and 4 me primary cooperative kua motsaneng wa mooiplaas o amogetše thušo go tšwa sekhwameng sa kimollo sa coronavirus (covid19) sa kgoro ya temo, mpshafatšo ya naga le tlhabollo ya dinagamagae ka baka la polasa ya gagwe, ya mae gagwe, diruiwa le merogo.
tgt_text: umnikazi we4 u and 4 me primary cooperative esigodini sasemooiplaas uthole ukuxhaswa esikhwameni somnyango wezolimo, ukuguqulwa komhlaba noku thuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya segciwane lecorona (icovid19) ngepulazi lakhe lamaqanda, imfuyo kanye nezitshalo.

src_text: kgoro e fane ka dibaotšhara tša go bitša r1.2 bilione go balemi bao ba di hlokago.
tgt_text: umnyango usukhiphe isi gidigidi esir1.2 samavawu sha kubalimi abawadingayo.

src_text: suduka o bolela gore di baotšhara di tla mo thuša go godiša lehlakore la kgwebo ya gagwe la go tšweletša mae.
tgt_text: usuduka uthi amavawusha akhe azomsiza ukukhulisa umkhiqizo wakhe wamaqanda ebhizinisini lakhe.

src_text: "ke amogetše dibaotšhara tše tharo tša go bitša r19 000. tšona ke baotšhara ya r12 000 go reka dikgogo tša go bea mae tse 100, baotšhara ya r6 500 ya go reka dijo tša dikgogo le baotšhara ya r500 ya go reka meryana.
tgt_text: "ngithole amavawusha amathathu ayisamba esiyizir19 000. ivawusha yezir12 000 yokuthenga izinkukhu zamaqanda eziyi100, ivawusha yezir6 500 yokuthenga ukudla kwezi nkukhu kanye nevawusha yamar500 yokuthenga imithi.

src_text: "o thomile polasa ya gagwe ya go tšweletša dikgogo ka go fepa dikgogo tša gae tša lapa la gabo ka dijo tša go di thwathwadiša mae, tšeo di di kgontšhago gore di thwathwatše mae ntle le gore di namelane.
tgt_text: "waqala ipulazi lokukhiqiza amaqanda ngokuphakela izinkukhu zomndeni wakhe ukudla kokukhulisa izinkukhu, okwenza ukuthi zikhiqize amaqanda ngaphandle kokukhwelana.

src_text: dikgogo tša gagwe gabjale di tšweletša mae a 50 ka letšatši, gomme yena o wa rekiša beke ka beke.
tgt_text: izinkukhu zakhe ezingama50 manje sezikhiqiza amaqanda angama50 ngosuku, akawadayisa njalo ngeviki.

src_text: suduka, yo le yena a tsenetšego tša temo ka dipudi tše 73, dinku tše 25 le dikgomo tše 25 o thomile tša temo ka 2015 morago ga go ikhweletša sethifikeithi sa n6 sa taolo ya mmušo go tšwa kholetšeng ya ikhala ya thutatiro le ya tlhahlo.
tgt_text: usuduka, ophinde afuye izimbuzi ezingama73, izimvu ezingama25 nezinkomo ezingama25, waqala ukuba umlimi ngonyaka wezi2015 emva kokuthola isitifiketi sezifundo zepublic manage ment sakwan6 esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme eikhala training and vocational edu cation and training college .

src_text: morago ga go lemoga gore mešomo ga e kaalo, a tšea sephetho sa go tšea polasa yeo ka nako yeo e bego e dirišwa ke lapa la gabo go iphediša a e fetošetša go ba kgwebo ya go dira letseno.
tgt_text: emva kokubona ukuthi awekho amathuba amaningi omsebenzi, wanquma ukutha tha ipulazi elalihlala umndeni wakhe ngaleso sikhathi waliguqula laba ibhizinisi elingenisa imali.

src_text: suduka ge a bolela o re: "re gotše re dira tša temo, ke moka morago ga go aloga ke tšeere sephetho sa go tsenela temo legatong la go inyakela mošomo."
tgt_text: usuduka uthi: "sikhule silima, ngakhoke emva kokuthola iziqu nganquma ukuthi ngilime kunokufuna umsebenzi."

src_text: se se ile sa hlatsela go ba sephetho sa hlohleletšo, kudu ka ge a godišitše dipudi le dikgomo tša palo ya go bonagala.
tgt_text: lokhu kutshengisa ukuba isinqumo esihle kakhulu, njengoba esekhulise izimbuzi nezinkomo eziningi.

src_text: polasa ya suduka ya di hektara tše tshela ka bogolo e tšweletša mafela, matapola, dierekise le dinawa.
tgt_text: ipulazi likasuduka elinga mahektha ayisithupha lezitshalo likhiqiza ummbila, amazambane, uphizi nobh ontshisi.

src_text: mafela a bjalwa dihektareng tše nne, matapola a bjalwa hektareng ye tee mola dierekisi le dinawa di bjalwa mo hektareng ya mafelelo.
tgt_text: ummbila utshalwe kumahektha amane, amazambane kwelilodwa bese uphizi nobhontshisi utshalwe kwi hektha lokugcina.

src_text: suduka o ithutile tše ntši go tšwa go covid19 , kuduku du ka gore thoto ye kaoneka one ke matsogo a gagwe le go šoma ga gagwe ka thata.
tgt_text: usuduka usefunde lukhulu kucovid19, ikakhulukazi uku thi amathuluzi ahamba phambili yizandla zakhe kanye nokusebenza kanzima.

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka o fetošeditše polasa ya lapa la gabo ya go iphediša go ba kgwebo ye nnyane.
tgt_text: umlimi omncane uthola uxhaso lwecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osafufusa wasempumalanga kapa ungomunye wabahlomule kuxhasomali lukahulumeni lwegciwane lecorona.

src_text: afrika borwa e tšea kgato ya go rarolla bothata bja tlhokego ya dithušagohema silusapho nyanda sethušagohema seo se dirilwego ka mo afrika borwa se tla thuša balwetši bao ba nago le dika tša magareng tša covid19 gore ba heme gabonolo.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika yenza umnyakazo wokubhekana nokuntuleka kwemishini yokuphefumula silusapho nyanda impi yokulwa nesifo segciwane lecorona (icovid19) eningizimu afrika seyiqinisiwe njengoba sibona umshini wokuphefumula wokuqala owenziwe kuleli.

src_text: ntwa kgahlanong le bolwetši bja coronavirus (covid19) ka afrika borwa e matlafaditšwe ke sethušagohema sa mathomo seo se dirilwego ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: umshini wokuphefumula ebizwa ngecontinuous positive airway pressure (icpap) usiza iziguli ezinezimpawu zecovid19 ezilingene zikwazi ukuphefumula kalula ngokuzihlinzeka ngomfutho olingene womoyampilo ozosiza ukugcina imigudu yomoya ivulekile.

src_text: sethušagohema sa continuous positive airway pressure (cpap) se thuša balwetši bao ba nago le dika tša magareng tša covid19 gore ba kgone go hema gabonolo ka go ba fa moya wa oksetšene gore o dire gore meelamoya ya bona e dule e bulegile.
tgt_text: umshini wokuphefumula wakhiwe ngokubambisana ngumkhandlu wocwaningo lwezesayensi nezimboni (icsir) nabalingani abaningana esebenzisana nabo kulo mkhakha futhi izosatshalaliswa ezweni lonke ezigulini ezikhombisa ukuba nengcindezi yokuphefumula esigabeni sokuqala sokutheleleka ngecovid19.

src_text: sethušagohema se hlamilwe ke ba council for scientific and industrial research (csir) ka tšhomišano le e tšwelapele letlakaleng la 2o boloke afrika borwammogo re ka fenya coronaviruso bolokeg batšeakarolo ba se bakae ba mo gae, gomme e tla abelwa balwetši go phatlalala le naga bao ba nago le mathata a go hema mo legatong la mathomo la phetelo ya covid19.
tgt_text: ngokuvamile umoya ophefumulwa umuntu unamaphesenti angama23 omoya ohlanzekile.

src_text: "moya woo motho ao hemago o na le dipersente tše 23 tša oksetšene.
tgt_text: umshini wokuphefumula wecpap ukwazi ukumpompa izinga elingaphezulu kwalokho lomoyampilo, nokusiza umuntu akwazi imishini yokuphefumula ekhiqizwe kuleli izosiza iziguli zecovid19 ezingenamandla zikwazi ukuphefumula kangconywana.

src_text: sethušagohema sa cpap se kgona go pompa oksetšene e ntšhi, gomme ya thuša motho go hema.
tgt_text: phefumula.

src_text: cpap e pompa oksetšene e sa emiše.
tgt_text: ophampu becpap bampompa umoyampilo ngokuqhubekayo.

src_text: o ka oketša goba wa fokotša bontšhi bja oksetšene yeo motho a e hemago," gwa realo molaodiphethiši wa csir future production: manufacturing, elego martin sanne.
tgt_text: linganyuswa noma lehliswe inani lomoyampilo umuntu awuphefumulayo," kusho isikhulu esingumphathi omkhulu ecsir future production: manufacturing, umartin sanne.

src_text: balwetši bao ba šomišago sethušagohema ba se lokelwa maskeng woo ba tla bego ba o apere oksetšene e gogwa go tšwa tankeng ya kgase gomme ya hlakantšhwa le moya wa tlhago ka gare ga sethušagohema, gomme go tloga moo o romelwa maskeng gomme wa hemelwa ka gare ke molwetši.
tgt_text: iziguli ezisebenzisa umshini wokuphefumula uxhunywe kusetshenziswa isimfonyo sobuso.

src_text: sanne o bolela gore godimo ga go pompa moya wa go ba le oksetšene, cpap e thuša gape balwetši gore ba hemele ka ntle.
tgt_text: umoyampilo udonswa ethangini lomoyampilo oxutshwe nomoya wemvelo kumshini wokuphefumula lapho uthunyelwa khona kusimfonyo bese uphefumulwa yisiguli.

src_text: sedirišwa sa cpap se ka šomišwa mafelong a tša maphelo a theknolotši ya godimo gape le ka mafelong a nakwana a bjalo ka maokelo a nakwana le mafelo a boipeelothoko.
tgt_text: usanne uthi phezu kokumpontshwa komoya onomoyampilo, icpap iphinde ilekelele iziguli zikwazi nokuwukhipha umoya.

src_text: sanne a re csir e tla be e kgonne go dira dithušagohema tše 10 000 ge kgwedi ya phato e fihla mafelelong.
tgt_text: icpap iyinsiza engasetshenziswa ezindaweni zobuchwepheshe obuseqophelweni eliphezulu iphinde ikwazi nokusetshenziswa ezikhungweni eziyizibhedlela zesikhashana nalapho kuhluswe khona abantu.

src_text: ka tšhomišano le siemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya le yunibesithi ya cape town, csir e tšweleditše cpap go ya le ka melawana ya mokgatlo wa lefase wa tša maphelo.
tgt_text: usanne uthi icsir izobe seyikhiqize imishini yokuphefumula eyizi10 000 ekupheleni kukancwaba.

src_text: dithušagohema tša mathomo di tla fiwa maokelo a mmušo ao a lego bothateng bja tlhokego ya didirišwa tša go lwantšhana le covid19.
tgt_text: ngokusebenzisana nesiemens, isimera, iakacia, igabler, iumoya nenyuvesi yasekapa, icsir ikhiqize icpap ngokwamazinga abekwe yinhlangano yezempilo yomhlaba.

src_text: csir e thomile go šomana le cpap morago ga gore lefase le itemogele tlhokego ye kgolo ya dithušagohema.
tgt_text: iqoqo lokuqala lemishini yokuphefumula lizonikezwa izibhedlela zikahulumeni ezibhekene nengcindezi ngenxa yokuntuleka kwezinsizakusebenza nemishini ekwazi ukulwa necovid19.

src_text: "dikgweding tša hlakola le moranang go bile le tlhokego ya dithušagohema go tšwa go baabi ba tšona ba boditšhabatšhaba.
tgt_text: icsir yaqala ukwakha icpap emuva kokuba umhlaba uqale ukubhekana nokuntuleka okukhulu kwemishini yokuphefumula.

src_text: moo di bego di hwetšagala gona di be di bitša kudu, gomme ke moo mmušo o ntšhitšego thentara ya go dira dithušagohema," gwa realo sanne.
tgt_text: "cishe ngondasa nombasa, kwaba nokuntuleka kwemishini yokuphefumula obekungazelelwe kubahlinzeki bethu bamazwe omhlaba.

src_text: thentara yeo e be e le karolo ya protšeke ya bosetšhaba ya dithušagohema ya ka lefapheng la tša kgwebo, intaseteri le phadišano.
tgt_text: uma ikhona indawo owawukwazi ukuyithola khona, yayimba eqolo kakhulu ngakho uhulumeni wakhipha ithenda yokukhiqiza le mishini yokuphefumula," kusho usanne.

src_text: csir e gare e šoma gape ka sethušagohema sa bilevel positive airway pressure seo nepo ya sona elego go thuša balwetši bao ba nago le dika tše šoro tša covid19sethušagohema seo se tla thuša ka go hemela ka gare le ka ntle, e ka ba ka mokgwa wa go gatelela moya goba ka go lekola kabo ya oksetšene yeo molwetši a e hlokago, gape le go beakanya kgatelelo ya moya go ya le ka moo e hlokegago.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika yenza umnyakazo wokubhekana nokuntuleka kwemishini yokuphefumula silusapho nyanda impi yokulwa nesifo segciwane lecorona (icovid19) eningizimu afrika seyiqinisiwe njengoba sibona umshini wokuphefumula wokuqala owenziwe kuleli.

src_text: thuša go emiša go phatlalala ga covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed setšhaba sa gaborena se lebagane le bothata bjo bogolo historing ya temokrasi ya rena.
tgt_text: siza ukunqanda ukusabalala kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu libhekene nensambatheka engakaze ibonwe emlandweni wethu wonke wentandoyeningi labantu.

src_text: mo matšatšing a go feta a 120, re atlegile go diteleng go phatlalala ga baerase yeo e hlolago masetlapelo lefaseng ka bophara.
tgt_text: ezinsukwini ezingaphezu kweziyi120, sesiphumelele ukukulibazisa nokho ukudlondlobala kwaleli gciwane eselidale umonakalo omkhulu emhlabenijikelele.

src_text: efela gabjale go keka ga diphetetšo, fao re kilego ra eletšwa ke ditsebi tša bongaka gore go tlo ba gona, go fihlile.
tgt_text: kodwa manje, ukudlondlobala kwesibalo sabantu abanegciwane esasitshelwe ngako yizazi zezempilo, sekuphezu kwethu.

src_text: palo ya go feta kotara ya milione ya maafrika borwa e fetetšwe ke coronavirus, gomme ebile re a tseba gore diphetetšo tše dintšhi di iphihlile.
tgt_text: abantu baseningizimu afrika abangaphezu kwekota lesigidi sebetheleleke ngegciwane lecorona, futhi siyazi ukuthi baningi abanye abatheleleke ngalo leli gciwane kodwa abangabonakali.

src_text: gabjale go netefatšwa diphetetšo tše diswa tša go feta 12 000 tšatši le lengwe le le lengwe.
tgt_text: njengamanje njalo ngosuku sithola abantu abangaphezu kwezi12,000 abanaleli gciwane.

src_text: esale go tloga mola bolwetši bjo bo phulegago ka kgwedi ya hlakola, go hlokofetše batho ba 4 079 ba bolawa ke covid19.
tgt_text: kusukela ekuqaleni kwalo mbhedukazwe ngondasa, okungenani abantu abayizi4,079 sebebulewe yigciwane lecovid19.

src_text: bjalo ka maphoto a magolo a go tonya ao a budulelago ka nageng ya rena go tšwa ka lewatleng la south atlantic mo nakong ye ya ngwaga, go na le dikarolo di se kae tša ka mo nageng tšeo di ka se fihlelelwego ke coronavirus.
tgt_text: njengoba izingxenye ezithile zezwe lethu zihlaselwe isimo sezulu esiletha amakhaza ashubisa umnkantsha eqhamuka ngasolwandle lweantilathikhi kulesi sikhathi sonyaka, kunezinye izingxenye ezimbalwa zezwe ezingeke zichaphazelwe yileli gciwane lecorona.

src_text: coronaviruse kotsi le go ba šoro kudu go feta efe goba efe yeo e kilego ya ba gona.
tgt_text: isichotho secorona sinamandla amakhulu futhi senza umonakalo ongaphezu kweminye esake sayibona ngaphambilini.

src_text: e tloga e tlaralatša mošomo wa didirišwa tša rena le maikemišetšo ka go fetišiša.
tgt_text: lokhu kuyaziqeda izinsizakalo zethu kanjalo namandla ethu okuphikelela aya ngokuya esiphelela.

src_text: go keka ga diphetetšo, elego seo se akantšwego ke ditsebi le boramahlale ba borena kgweding tše tharo tšeo di fetilego, go fihlile.
tgt_text: ukudlondlobala kwamanani abantu abatheleleke ngegciwane ososayensi ababesixwayise ngako esikhathini sezinyanga ezingaphezu kwezi3 ezidlule sekusificile.

src_text: go thomile ka kapa bodikela gomme gabjale go tsene ka kapa bohlabela le ka gauteng.
tgt_text: kwaqala entshonalanga kapa kanti kuyaqhubeka empumalanga kapa nasegauteng.

src_text: le ge go le bjalo, ge diphetetšo di golela godimo ka lebelo, go bohlokwa go lemoga gore palo ya mahu ya dipersente tše 1.5 ke ye nngwe ya dipalo tša fasefase lefaseng ge e bapetšwa le ya lefase ya dipersente tše 4.4. go ba fasefase ga palo ya mahu ka nageng ya gaborena go hlotšwe ke maitemogelo le boikgafo bja bašomedi ba tša maphelo gape le magato a tšhoganetšo ao re a tšeerego go hlabolla mokgwa wa tša maphelo.
tgt_text: yize noma, izibalo zabantu abatheleleke ngegciwane zikhula ngamandla, kusemqoka ukuqaphela ukuthi izinga lokudlula kwabantu emhlabeni eliyiphesenti eyi1.5 lingelinye laphansi kakhulu emhlabeni.

src_text: le ge bontšhi bja batho ba gaborena ba tšeere magato a go thibela phatlalalo ya baerase, go na le bao ba sego ba dira bjalo.
tgt_text: lokhu kuqhathaniswa nezinga lokudlula kwabantu emhlabeni elingamaphesenti ayi4.4.

src_text: go na le ba bangwe bao ba hlokomologago melawana yeo e fetišitšwego ya go lwantšhana le bolwetši bjo.
tgt_text: ukuba kwethu nezibalo eziphansi zabantu abadlulayo emhlabeni kungenxa yesipiliyoni nokuzinikela kwabasebenzi bethu bezempilo kanjalo nezinyathelo ezathathwa ngokushesha esasisophe ngazo ukulungiselela umkhakha wethu wezempilo uma sekwehla le nhlekelele futhi sizihlomise ngezinsiza esizidingayo.

src_text: mo kgabagareng ya leuba le, go tsena ka gare ga thekisi o se wa apara maske, go kopana le bagwera, go ya meletlong goba gona go etela meloko, go ka phatlalatša baerase gabonolo gomme gwa ba le go lobja ga maphelo.
tgt_text: nakuba abantu bethu abaningi benze imizamo yokuvikela igciwane, bakhona abanye abangazange bazihluphe.

src_text: bjo e ka no ba e le bolwetši bjoo bo hlolwago ke baerase, efela bo phatlalatšwa ke mekgwa le maitshwaro a batho.
tgt_text: bakhona abanye phakathi kwethu abangazigqizi qakala izimiso nemithetho ebekiwe ukuze sizame ukuqeda lesi sifo.

src_text: ka maitshwaro a rena – re le batho, malapa le ditšhaba – re ka kgona ebile re swanetše re fetole mokgwaphatlalalo wa leuba le ka mo nageng.
tgt_text: phakathi kwalolu bhubhane olunje, ukugibela nje itekisi ngaphandle kwesimfonyo sobuso ukuhlangana njengabangani, ukuhamba imicimbi yobumnandi noma ukuvakashela umndeni, kungasabalalisa igciwane kalula kusimuke izimpilo zabantu.

src_text: re swanetše re apare maske wa lešela woo o khupetšago nko le molomo nako ye nngwe le ye nngwe ge re e tšwa ka gae.
tgt_text: lesi kungaba yisifo esibangwa yigciwane, kodwa sisatshalaliswa yindlela abantu abaziphatha nabaphila ngayo.

src_text: re swanetše re tšwele pele go hlapa diatla ka meetse le sesepe goba sebolayaditwatši ka mehla.
tgt_text: ngezenzo zethu – njengabantu ngabodwana, njengemindeni, nemiphakathi – singakwazi futhi kumele siguqule isivinini ohamba ngaso lo mbulalazwe ezweni lethu.

src_text: re swanetše re tšwele pele go hlwekiša le go bolaya ditwatši mabatong ka moka a mafelo a bohle.
tgt_text: kufanele sifake isimfonyo sobuso sendwangu esimboza ikhala nomlomo njalo lapho siphuma emakhaya ethu.

src_text: sa bohlokwa le go feta ke gore re swanetše re bule sekgoba sa dimitara tše pedi gare ga rena le batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: kufanele siqhubeke nokugeza izandla zethu njalonjalo ngensipho namanzi noma ngesibulalimagciwane.

src_text: gabjale go na le bohlatse bjoo bo tšwelelago bja gore baerase ye e ka kgona le go fofa moyeng mo mafelong ao a tletšego batho ba bantšhi, ao a tswalegilego goba ao ka go ona moya o sa sepelego botse.
tgt_text: kufanele siqhubeke nokuhlanza zonke izindawo ezisobala ezindaweni ezisetshenziswa abantu abaningi.

src_text: ka lona lebaka le, re swanetše re hlabolle mafelo a setšhaba ao a tswalegilego ka pelapela, elego fao kotsi ya go fetelwa e lego godimo kudu.
tgt_text: okubaluleke kakhulu, kufanele sigcine kunegebe eliphephile phakathi kwethu nabanye abantu – okungenani ibanga elingamamitha amabili – kwabanye abantu.

src_text: sephetho sa rena sa go tla ka kiletšo ya mosepelo ya bosetšhaba se thibetše phatlalalo ya diphetetšo mathomong ge ditirelo tša maphelo di be di se tša itokiša, elego seo se ka bego se hlotše tobo ye kgolo ya maphelo.
tgt_text: manje sekunobufakazi obuvelayo bokuthi leli gciwane lingase futhi lisabalale nangezinhlayiya ezincane ezihamba emoyeni ezindaweni ezinezixuku zabantu, ezivalekile noma ezingakhiphi umoya ngendlela efanele.

src_text: ka nako yeo re bilego le yona, re tšeere magato a bohlokwa go matlafatša mekgwa ya go ikarabela ya tša maphelo.
tgt_text: ngenxa yalesi sizathu kufanele siphangise ukuphucula isimo sangaphakathi sezindawo ezisetshenziswa umphakathi lapho ubungozi bokutheleleka bubukhulu kakhulu khona.

src_text: re šetše re dirile diteko tša coronavirus tša go feta dimilione tše pedi, gomme bašomedi ba tša maphelo ba šetše ba dirile diponego tša go feta dimilione tše 20. re dirile gore go be le mepete e 28 000 ya balwetši ba covid19 ka maokelong, gomme ebile re agile maokelo a nakwana go kgabaganya naga.
tgt_text: isinqumo sethu sokumemezela ukuvalwa kwezwe lonke savikela ukuqubuka ngamandla kwesifo ngenkathi umkhakha wethu wezempilo ungakalungiselelwa, nobekungaholela ekudluleni kwabantu abaningi emhlabeni.

src_text: gabjale re na le mepete e 37 000 ya boipeelothoko mafelong a poraebete le a setšhaba go kgabaganya naga, gomme a itokišeditše go amogela bao ba sa kgonego go ipeela thoko ka magae.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi ebesinaso, sithathe izinyathelo ezibalulekile zokuhlomisa umkhakha wethu wezempilo ukuze ukwazi ukubhekana nalolu bhubhane.

src_text: re rekile le go aba dimilione tša didirišwa tša go itšhireletša maokelong, dikliniking le dikolong go kgabaganya naga, e lego tša go šireletša bašomedi bao ba šomago ka batho ba bantšhi.
tgt_text: sesenze ukuhlolwa kwegciwane lecorona okungaphezu kwezigidi ezimbili kanti abasebenzi bezempilo bomphakathi sebenze ukuhlungwa kweziguli okungaphezu kwezigidi ezingama20.

src_text: re thwetše ebile re sa thwala baoki, dingaka le bašomedi ba tša tšhoganetšo ba tlaleletšo.
tgt_text: sithole imibhede yezibhedlela ebalelwa kweziyi28,000 yeziguli zecovid19 futhi sesakhe ngempumelelo izibhedlela zesikhashana ezweni lonkana.

src_text: re tšwela pele go ba le tšwelopele mo maitekelong a rena a go lwantšha covid19, efela tlhotlo ye kgolo e sa etla.
tgt_text: njengamanje sinemibhede engaphezu kweziyi37,000 ezikhungweni zokugonqisa abantu embonini yezempilo ezimele neyomphakathi, elungele ukwamukela abantu abangakwazi ukuhlala ngabodwana emakhaya.

src_text: re šoma go kgabaganya diprofense go oketša palo ya mepete ya ka diwateng le ka tlhokomelong yeo e tseneletšego re direla balwetši ba covid19.
tgt_text: sithole futhi sathumela izimpahla eziyizigidi eziyizinsiza zokuzivikela ezibhedlela, emitholampilo nasezikoleni ezweni lonke ukuze sivikele abasebenzi bethu abangamabutho ayibambe ophondweni.

src_text: sekgoba se a bulwa ka maokelong a mmalwa ka go se amogele balwetši bao ba sa hlokego thušo ya tšhoganetšo.
tgt_text: siqashe futhi siyaqhubeka nokuqasha abahlengikazi abengeziwe, odokotela nabasebenzi abasebenza ophikweni lwezimo eziphuthumayo.

src_text: go fetolwa gape le mafelo a mangwe ka maokelong go ba diwate tša tlaleletšo, gape le go agwa goba go oketšwa ga maokelo a nakwana.
tgt_text: siyaqhubeka nokwenza inqubekelaphambili emizamweni yethu yokubhekana necovid19, kepha inselele yethu enkulu isasimele ngaphambili.

src_text: re šoma go oketša kabo ya oksetšene, dithušagohema le didirišwa tše dingwe bakeng sa bao ba tlo hlokago tlhokomelo yeo e tseneletšego, go balwa le kabo ya oksetšene bakeng sa mabaka a mangwe.
tgt_text: kuzo zonke izifundazwe, sisebenzela ukwandisa isibalo samagumbi ezimo ezijwayelekile kanye nemibhede yeziguli zecovid19 ezisesimweni esibucayi.

src_text: re diriša ditheknolotši tša titšithale go matlafatša taetšo, go nyakana gape le go beela thoko balwetši, le go thekga bao diteko tša bona di laetšago ba fetetšwe.
tgt_text: umthamo omumathwa yigumbi lasesibhedlela uyandiswa ezibhedlela eziningi ngokubambezela ukunakekelwa kweziguli ezingadingi usizo oluphuthumayo, ukuguqulwa kwezinye izindawo zasezibhedlela zibe amawadi engeziwe kanjalo nokwakhiwa noma ukunwetshwa kwezibhedlela zesikhashana.

src_text: bjale ka ge re lebile sehloeng sa diphetetšo, re hloka go ba le tlhokomelo ye kgolo le go thatafatša magato ao a latelwago gabjale go fokotša lebelo la diphetetšo.
tgt_text: sisebenzela ukwandisa izinsiza zokuhlinzeka ngomoyampilo, imishini yokuphefumula neminye imishini kulabo abadinga ukunakekelwa okubucayi, kubandakanya ukuphambukisa usizo ngomoyampilo kwezinye izindawo ubhekiswe ezigulini zecovid19.

src_text: melawana ya mabapi le go apara dimaske e tla thatafatšwa.
tgt_text: sisebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bedijithali ukuqinisa ukuhlonzwa, ukuthungathwa kanye nokuhlaliswa ngabodwana kwabantu abake bahlangana nabantu abanegciwane, kanjalo nokuhlinzeka ngokwesekwa kulabo abathola imiphumela ebika ukuthi banalo igciwane.

src_text: bengmešomo, bengmabenkele le balaodi, baotledi ba dinamelwa tša bohle, gape le balaodi le beng ba meago efe goba efe ya setšhaba, gabjale ba tlamegile semolao go netefatša gore yo mongwe le yo mongwe yoo a tsenago ka moagong goba ka senamelweng sa bona o swanetše go ba a apere maske.
tgt_text: njengoba manje sesisondele kuvuthondaba lokutheleleka kwabantu ngaleli gciwane, sidinga ukucophelela kakhulu ekulandeleni izinyathelo zokuphepha futhi siqinise izinyathelo ezikhona ukuze sehlisa izinga lokuthelelana ngegciwane.

src_text: dithekisi tšeo di tšeago maeto a kgauswi di a dumelelwa go rwala go fihlela dipersenteng tše lekgolo, mola tša maeto a matelele di se tša dumelelwa go feta dipersente tše masomešupa, gomme gona fao go latelwe melawana e meswa ya mabapi le dimaske, go bolaya ditwatši ka dinamelweng gape le go bula mafasetere.
tgt_text: izimiso ezibekiwe mayelana nokufakwa kwezimfonyo zizoqiniswa.

src_text: gabjale go na le bohlatse bjoo bo tletšego bja gore thekišo ya dinotagi e hlotše kgatelelo ye kgolo go maokelo, go akaretšwa le ka diyuniting tša maemo a tšhoganetšo le tša tlhokomelo yabao ba bakwago le badimo ka baka la dikotsi tša difatanaga, dikgaruru le mathata a go sepelelana le tšona.
tgt_text: abaqashi, abaninizitolo nabaphathi, abasebenza ngezithuthi zomphakathi, nabaphathi kanye nabanikazi banoma yisiphi isakhiwo somphakathi manje baphoqelekile ngokomthetho ukuthi baqinisekise ukuthi noma ngubani ongena emagcekeni abo noma ezimotweni zabo ungena efake isimfonyo.

src_text: ka fao, re tšeere sephetho sa gore, go re re kgone go lota sekgoba seo se šetšego se le gona ka maokelong, gona thekišo, kabo le phatlalatšo ya dinotagi e tla fegwa go tloga gonabjalebjale.
tgt_text: amatekisi athatha uhambo endaweni manje azovunyelwa ukuthi enyuse isibalo sabagibeli bagcwale itekisi, kanti lapho abathatha uhambo lwamabanga amade ngeke bavunyelwe ukuthatha isibalo esevile kumaphesenti angama70, futhi inqobo uma kulandelwe imigomo emisha yokunciphisa ubungozi ehlobene nezimfonyo, ukuhlanzwa kwetekisi ngezibulalimagciwane kanye nokuvulwa kwamafasitela.

src_text: bjalo ka legato la tlaleletšo la go fokotša tlalelo ya maokelo, ga go na motho yoo a swanetšego go ba ka ntle mebileng go tloga ka iri ya senyane bošego go fihla ka iri ya bone ka masa.
tgt_text: sekunobufakazi obucacile bokuthi ukuvulwa kabusha kokuthengiswa kotshwala kulethe ingcindezi enkulu ezibhedlela, kubandakanya amayunithi ezinhlekelele nalawo abagula kakhulu, ngenxa yezingozi zezimoto, udlame kanye nokulimala okuhlobene notshwala.

src_text: re tšea magato a re tseba gabotse gore ga a amogelege ebile a bea mapheko maphelong a batho, efela a swanetše gore a tšewe gore re kgone go feta sehloa sa bolwetši.
tgt_text: ngakhoke sinqume ukuthi ukuze sigcine isibalo sabangeniswa ezibhedlela silawuleka, ukudayiswa, ukukhishwa nokusatshalaliswa kotshwala kuzomiswa kusuka manje.

src_text: ga go na ka mokgwa woo re ka efogago lephoto la coronavirus, efela re ka kgona go fokotša tshenyo yeo le ka e hlolago maphelong a rena.
tgt_text: njengesinyathelo esengeziwe sokunciphisa ingcindezi ezibhedlela, kuzobekwa umnqamulajuqu wesikhathi okuvunyelwe ngaso ukuba ngaphandle kwamakhaya phakathi kwehora lesi9 ebusuku nehora lesi4 ekuseni.

src_text: bjalo ka setšhaba, re a thekgana, re thekga le bao ba lwalago ebile re hlohleletša kamogelo ya batho bao ba phelago ka baerase ye.
tgt_text: sithatha lezi zinyathelo sazi kamhlophe ukuthi zibeka imingcele engathandeki ezimpilweni zabantu.

src_text: gabjale, le go feta peleng, re rwele maikarabelo a bao re phelago le bona.
tgt_text: kodwake, ziyadingeka, ukuze sikwazi ukuphepha kulesi sikhathi esiwuvuthondaba lwalolu bhubhane.

src_text: re tla le fediša lephoto le.
tgt_text: asikwazi ukusigwema lesi sivunguvungu segciwane lecorona.

src_text: re tla bušetša naga ya gaborena maemong a mabotse a maphelo, gomme ebile re tla ba le tšwelopele.
tgt_text: kodwa singawubeka umkhawulo esingawudala ezimpilweni zethu.

src_text: re tla fenya.
tgt_text: siza ukunqanda ukusabalala kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu libhekene nensambatheka engakaze ibonwe emlandweni wethu wonke wentandoyeningi labantu.

src_text: go keteka basadi ka go ba go keteka basadi ka go ba akaretša ekonomingakaretša ekonoming vukuzenzele unnamed ka phato afrika borwa e keteka kgwedi ya basadi.
tgt_text: ukubungazwa kwabesifazane ukubungazwa kwabesifazane ngokubabandakanya kwezomnothongokubabandakanya kwezomnotho vukuzenzele unnamed ngoncwaba iningizi mu afrika ibungaza inyanga yabesifazane.

src_text: tiragalo ye e dira matswalo a letšatši ka 1956 ge basadi ba 20 000 ba matšhetša union buildings – basadi ba bantši ba go bolela malema a go fapana, go tšwa mafelong a go fapana gomme ba mehlobo ka moka.
tgt_text: lo mgubho uyisikhumbuzo sosuku enyakeni we1956 lapho abesifazane abayizi20 000 bamashela ezindlini zombuso – isixuku sabesifazane abakhuluma izilimi eziningi, abaphuma ezindaweni ezehlukene futhi babobonke ubuhlanga.

src_text: ba be ba kopane ka senyakwa sa bona sa go fediša melao ya dipasa le tokelo ya bona ya go phela ka tokologo.
tgt_text: babebumbene ezimfunweni zabo zokuqedwa nya kwemithetho emibi yokuphathwa kwamapasi kanye nelungelo labo lokuphila ngenkululeko.

src_text: maemo le kemo ya basadi ka afrika borwa lehono a fapana kudu le ao bommago rena le bokoko a rena ba bego ba phela ka fase ga wona ka 1956. re tšwa kgole gore re be le afrika borwa ya go hloka semorafe, ya go hloka kgethologanyo ya bong, ya go huma gape yeo e lokologilego.
tgt_text: isimo nalapho abesifazane eni ngizimu afrika abakhona namuhla sehluke kakhulu kunaleso esasibhekene nomama kanye nogogo bethu ngowe1956.

src_text: go bile le tšwelopele kudu mo go kaonafatšeng maphelo a basadi ba afrika borwa go ekonomi, lekala la dipolotiki le go bophelo bja setšhaba.
tgt_text: sesibuya kude kakhulu ukuze sifinyelele kwiningizimu afrika engenabuhlanga, engenabulili, yentando yeningi, ephumelelayo futhi ekhululekile.

src_text: go le bjalo, re a tseba gore re sa ya kgole.
tgt_text: sekube nenqubekelaphambili ebonakalayo ekwenzeni ngcono izimpilo zabesifazane baseningizimu afrika kwezomnotho, kwezepolitiki kanye nasempilweni yomphakathi.

src_text: basadi ba sa lebane le kgethollo, tlhorišo le dikgaruru, gomme ba sa phela ka bohloki.
tgt_text: ngaso leso sikhathi, siyazi ukuthi kusekuningi okusamele sikwenze.

src_text: ge e le gore ka nnete re nyaka go diragatša tshepišo ya molaotheo wa rena re swanetše go lwantšha dikgato tse di dirago gore basadi ba se be le letseno le tšhelete moo go dirago gore ba ikhwetše ba kgotleletše go hlorišwa le go bethwa.
tgt_text: abesifazane basabhekana nokucwaswa, ukuhlukunyezwa kanye nodlame, futhi babhekane ngqo nobumpofu.

src_text: re tsenetše lesolo la go ribolla leswika leo le re amantšhago le maitapišo a lefase a go fihlelela tekatekano ya bong ka 2030. tekatekano ya meloko ke agenda ya tlhohleletšo le phetogo go fediša kgethollo le dikgaruru kgahlanong le basadi le bana le go kgatha tema ka go lekana bophelong bja dipolotiki, leago le ekonomi.
tgt_text: uma sizosifeza ngempela isithembiso somthethosisekelo wethu kumele sibhekane nokubekwa eceleni kwezomnotho nasezimalini okwenza abesifazane babe buthaka kakhulu ekuhlukunyezweni nasodlameni.

src_text: bjalo ka karolo ya lesolo le, re kopantše ‘ditirišano tša twantšho’ tše pedi, yenngwe ke ya toka le ditokelo tša ekonomi ge ye nngwe e le ya kgahlanong le dikgaruru tše di ekadilego ka bong.
tgt_text: sesihlanganyele emkhankasweni oyingqophamlando osihla nganisa nemizamo yomhlaba jikelele ukuzuza ukulingana ngokobulili ngonyaka wezi2030.

src_text: bobedi ditabakgolo tše di bohlokwa go agenda ya rena ya bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: ukulingana kwesizukulwana kuluhlelo olunezifiso nezinguquko oluzoqeda ukucwaswa nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane kanye nokubandakanywa kwabo okulinganayo empilweni yezepolitiki, yezenhlalo kanye nomnotho.

src_text: dikgwedi tše 11 go tloga mola leano la twantšho la go arabela la tšhoganetšo go lwantšha dikgaruru tšeo di ikadilego ka bong le dipolao tša basadi (gbvf) ke banna le phethagatšwago go bonagetše tšwelopele go godiša thekgo le tlhokomelo ya bao ba phologilego, gomme go na le tšwelopele go kaonafatšeng molao go ba fa tšhireletšo ye kgolo.
tgt_text: njengengxenye yalo mkhankaso, sesihlangane ‘nemifelandawonye’ emibili, owodwa wezobulungiswa kwezomnotho namalungelo kanye nomunye olwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile.

src_text: mo kgweding ya phato, re thoma ka phethagatšo ya leano la peakanyo la bosetšhaba go lwantšha gbvf ke banna.
tgt_text: zombili lezi zingqikithi zibaluleke kakhulu ohlelweni lwethu lukazwelonke.

src_text: ntlha ya bohlokwa ya leano le ke go kgonthiša gore basadi ba bantši ba fiwa kudu menyetla mo ditšheleteng.
tgt_text: ezinyangeni ezilishumi nanye kusuka uhlelo oluphuthumayo lomabizwasabele lokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane lwaqalwa sekube nenqubekelaphambili ekusabalaliseni ukweseka nokunakekela labo abasindile, inqubekelaphambili iyabonakala kwezomthetho ukubanika ukuvikeleka okuthe xaxa.

src_text: se ke ka gore go se lekalekane ga ekonomi le go se lekalekane ga leago go a sepelelana.
tgt_text: ngenyanga kancwaba, siqalisa ukusebenza kohlelo lwamasu kazwelonke ukulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane.

src_text: maemo a basadi ka afrika borwa a ba dira gore ba be kotsing ya go hlorišwa.
tgt_text: okubaluleke kakhulu kulolu hlelo kusekuqinisekiseni ukubandakanyeka okukhulu kwabe sifazane kwezezimali.

src_text: re swanetše go oketša thekgo ya basadi go ba kgontšha gore ba itirele tšhelete ya bona.
tgt_text: lokhu kungenxa yokuthi ukungalingani kwezomnotho nokungalingani kwezenhlalo kuyahambisana.

src_text: re dirile maikgafo a mmalwa ka fase ga tekatekano ya moloko yeo e tla tšweletšago dipoelo ka leano la peakanyo ya bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: isimo sabesifazane kwezomnotho eningizimu afrika kubenza babe buthaka kakhulu ekuhlukunyezweni.

src_text: sa mathomo, re ya go tsentšha basadi mererong ya ekonomi ka go ba abela dithendara.
tgt_text: ngakhoke kumele sikhuphule ukwesekwa kwabesifazane ukuze bakwazi ukuzimela bona ngokwezimali.

src_text: re beile selebanywa sa go kgonthiša gore bonnyane dithoto le ditirelo tša go lekana 40% tšeo di rekilwego ke makala a setšhaba di tšwe dikgwebong tša basadi.
tgt_text: sesenze ukuzinikela okuningi ngaphansi kokulingana kwesizukulwana okuzoba yimpumelelo ngohlelo lwamasu kazwelonke.

src_text: sa bobedi, re ya go oketša thekgo go dismme tša basadi le go basadi bao ba nago le dikgwebo tša mo mebileng goba bao ba sa šomego.
tgt_text: okokuqala, sizoqhuba ukubandakanyeka kwabesifazane kwezomnotho ngentengiso kahulumeni.

src_text: se se tla akaretša go boledišana le makala a ditšhelete go dira gore ditirelo tša ditšhelete di fihlelelege le go rekega go basadi.
tgt_text: sibeke ukuthi sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi okungenani izimpahla ezingamaphesenti angama40 nezinsiza ezithengwa nguhulumeni zithengwa emabhizinisini aphethwe ngabesifazane.

src_text: sa boraro, re nyaka go kgonthiša gore basadi ba bantši ba na le dithoto tša bohlokwa go swana le naga.
tgt_text: okwesibili, sizokhuphulaukwesekwa kwamasmme aphethwe ngabesifazane kanye nabesifazane abasebenza imisebenzi engahlelekile noma abangasebenzi.

src_text: go bohlokwa gore basadi e be baholegi ba lenaneo le potlakišitšwego la poelo ya mafase.
tgt_text: lokhu kuzobandakanya ukuxoxisana nomkhakha wezezimali ukwenza ukuthi izinsiza zezimali abesifazane bafinyelele kuzona futhi zingabizi.

src_text: go bohlokwa gore go r75 milione ya diboutšhara tšeo di beetšwego kimollo ya covid19 ya kabo ya temo 53% ya baholegi e tla ba basadi ba magaeng.
tgt_text: okwesithathu, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abesifazane abaningi bayafinyelela ezimpahleni zokukhiqiza ezifana nomhlaba.

src_text: re swanetše go kgonthiša gore basadi ba balemi ba ka gae le ba bannyane ba tšwela pele go amogela thekgo ka morago ga leuba.
tgt_text: kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi abesifazane babe ngabazuzi bohlelo lokubuyiswa komhlaba.

src_text: sa bone, re nyaka go kgonthiša gore basadi ba šireletšwa go dikgaruru tšeo di ikadilego ka bong mo mošomong.
tgt_text: kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi izigidi ezingama75 zamarandi zoxha so lwecovid19 ezibekelwe amavawusha ezolimo amaphesenti angama53 kwabazozuza kuzoba ngabesifazane basemakhaya.

src_text: ka tsela yeo re tla ba re šoma legatong la bosetšhaba le la selete go tumelelano ya kopano ya ilo ka ga dikgaruru le tlhorišo mošomong.
tgt_text: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi abatshali bokudla besifazane kanye nabalimi abancane bayaqhubeka ukuthola ukwesekwa nangale kobhubhane.

src_text: go thwe tokologo ga e fiwe, eupša e a tšewa.
tgt_text: okwesine, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abesifazane bayavikelwa kudlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile ezindaweni zokusebenza.

src_text: tokologo ya basadi ke mantšu fela ao a lego letlakaleng ntle le ge e ka bapetšwa ke boikgafo go tšwa go makala ka moka a setšhaba.
tgt_text: ngalokhuke, sizobe sise benza ezingeni likazwelonke nelesifunda ukuvumelana nengqungquthela yenhlangano yabasebenzi yamazwe ngamazwe ngodlame nokuhlukunyezwa emsebenzini.

src_text: ge re beakanya kagolefsa ya ekonomi ya rena mo tlhohlong ya leuba la coronavirus , re rile re ka se boele moo re bego re le gona pele ga go phulega ga baerase.
tgt_text: kuyashiwo ukuthi inkululeko ayikhangezwa, kodwa iyathathwa.

src_text: re swanetše go aga ekonomi ye bohlokwa ya go fapana le yeo re bego re na le yona yeo, gare ga dilo tše dingwe, e kaonafatšago maemo a bohlokwa a basadi.
tgt_text: ukukhululwa kwabesifazane kungamagama abhalwe phansi nje kuphela ngaphandle uma ehambisana nokuzinikela kwemikhakha yonke yomphakathi.

src_text: se se ra gore peeletšo ya rena ka mananeokgoparara ga se ya swanela go thekga fela kaonafatšo ya diintasteri tša gae, eupša le dikgwebo tša basadi.
tgt_text: njengoba silungiselela ukuphinde sifukule umnotho wethu emva kobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona , sithe ngeke nje sivele sibuyele lapho kade sikhona ngaphambi kokuqubuka kwegciwane.

src_text: e swanetše go hlola dibaka tša mešomo mo magatong ka moka a peakanyo, go thekga ka ditšhelete, go aga le go hlokomela mananeokgoparara.
tgt_text: kumele sakhe isisekelo somnotho owehlukile, phakathi kwezinye zezinto, ozothuthukisa isimo sabesifazane.

src_text: ka tekanyo ya go swana ge re oketša thekgo ya mananeo a mešomo ya setšhaba, re swanetše go kgonthiša gore makgarebe kudu ba swanetše go ba bakgathatema.
tgt_text: lokhu kusho ukuthi utshalomali lwethu kwingqalasizinda akumele lweseke kuphela ukuthuthukiswa kwezimboni zasekhaya, kodwa namabhizinisi aphethwe ngabesifazane.

src_text: godimo ga go hwetša letseno, mananeo a a tla ba fa sebaka go hwetša mabokgoni a mangwe le maitemogelo ao a hlokegago go kgatha tema ekonoming ye kgolo.
tgt_text: kumele ludale amathuba emisebenzi yabesifazane kuzozonke izigaba zoku hlela, ezezimali, ezokwakha kanye nokunakekelwa kwezingqalasizinda.

src_text: le ge e le maikarabelo a mmušo go aba dibaka tša ekonomi go basadi le go hlola tlhako ya go kgontšha go tšwetša pele tekatekano ya bong, mang le mang mo setšhabeng o swanetše go kgatha tema ya gagwe.
tgt_text: ngendlela efanayo, njengoba sikhuphula izinhlelo zemisebenzi yomphakathi, kumele siqinisekise ukuthi abesifazane abasebasha ikakhulukazi babamba iqhaza.

src_text: dikgwebo di swanetše go thekga dikgwebo tša basadi ka go reka mo go tšona dithoto le ditirelo.
tgt_text: ekwengezeni kumalingeniso, lezi zinhlelo zizobahlinzeka ngethuba lokufunda amakhono kanye nesipiliyoni esidingekayo ukungena kumnotho ohlukahlukene.

src_text: di swanetše go thwala basadi ba bantši gomme ba thwale basadi ba bantši maemong a bolaodi.
tgt_text: noma kuyisibopho sikahulumeni ukuhlinzeka abesifazane ngamathuba omnotho futhi akhe uhlaka oluvumela ukuphucula ukulingana ngokobulili, wonke umuntu emphakathini kudingeka ukuthi adlale indima yakhe.

src_text: se se bohlokwa kudu go lebeletšwe gore rekoto ya lekala la praebete mo go kemedi ya bong legatong la taolo e šaletše morago go ya lekala la setšhaba.
tgt_text: amabhizinisi kumele asekele amabhizinisi aphethwe ngabesifazane ekuthengeni izimpahla nezinsiza.

src_text: ye ke taba yeo e tšweletšwago gantši mo dipoledišanong tšeo ke bilego le tšona le mekgatlo ye mmalwa ya dikgwebo tša basadi.
tgt_text: kumele baqashe abesifazane kakhulu futhi babeke abesifazane abaningi ezikhundleni zokuphatha.

src_text: gore re be le tekatekano re swanetše go fediša setlwaedi sa megolo ya go se lekane go ya ka gore motho ke monna goba mosadi gomme re lefa batho ba ba dirilego mošomo wa go swana ka go lekana go ya ka molao wa tekatekano ya mošomo.
tgt_text: lokhu kubaluleke kakhulu uma ubheka ukuthi ucwaningo lomkhakha ozimele mayelana nokumelwa kobulili ezingeni loku phatha lubonisa ukuba semuva kunalolo lomkhakha kahulumeni.

src_text: basadi ba swanetšwe go šireletšwa go tlhorišo le kgethologanyo mošomong.
tgt_text: lena inkinga ehlale ivela ezingxoxweni engibe nazo nezinhlangano zamabhizinisi abesifazane eziningi.

src_text: ke maikarabelo a basepediši ba dinamelwa, balaodi ba diyunibesithi, makgotlataolo a dikolo le mekgatlo ya sedumedi go hlola maemo a a bolokegilego go basadi le basetsana go ka tšea maeto, go ya dikolong le go ya dikerekeng.
tgt_text: ngokulinganayo, kumele siqede ukungafani emiholweni yabesilisa nabesifazane, bese silandela isimiso somholo olinganayo oqukethwe kumthetho wokuqashwa ngokulingana.

src_text: re swanetše go tšwela pele ka maitapišo a rena a go fediša go nyatšwa ga basadi ke banna, kgethollo ya basadi ke banna le go dira banna dihlogo.
tgt_text: abesifazane kumele bavikelwe ekuhlukumezweni nasekubandlululweni endaweni yokusebenza.

src_text: ke mekgwa ye yeo e dirago gore go be le kgatelelo ya basadi.
tgt_text: kusemahlombe abashayeli bezithuthi, abaphathi bamanyuvesi, ibhodi elilawula ukuphathwa kwesikole kanye nezinhlangano zezenkolo ukwenza izimo abesifazane namantombazane abazo hamba, bafunde futhi bakhonze kuzo bephephile.

src_text: go tšwa go rena – bobedi banna le basadi – go kgonthiša gore mohola wa mosadi, maemo le dikgopolo ga di fetwe ke tša monna.
tgt_text: kumele siphokophele phambili ngemizamo yethu yokuqeda ukuthi abesilisa bakhulu kunabesifazane, ukucwasana ngokobulili kanye nokunikeza amandla abesilisa.

src_text: ke maikarabelo a rena bjalo ka batswadi le bokoko le borakgolo go swara le go godiša barwa le barwedi ba rena go swana.
tgt_text: yiyo le ndlela yokucabanga edala ukucindezelwa kwabesifazane.

src_text: go tšwa go rena bjalo ka banna go gana le go bolela kgahlanong le ditiragalo tša gbv ge re di bona, le ge e le gore di dirwa ke bagwera ba rena, bopapa ba rena goba bobuti ba rena.
tgt_text: kusezandleni zethu – sonke abesilisa nabesifazane – ukugcizelela ukuthi ubugugu, isikhundla kanye nombono womuntu wesifazane awukho mncane kunalowo wowesilisa.

src_text: a re beng moloko woo o fedišago kgatelelo ya basadi ka mekgwa ya yona ka moka, mo maphelong a rena.
tgt_text: kusezandleni zethu njengabazali kanye nogogo nomkhulu ukuphatha nokukhulisa amadodana namadodakazi ethu ngokufana.

src_text: moloko wa bagale wa 1956 o matšheditše rena ka moka.
tgt_text: kusezandleni zethu madoda ukwala nokuphumela obala silwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile noma ikuphi lapho silubona, noma ngabe lwenziwa ngumngani wethu, obaba noma abafowethu.

src_text: re a ba hlompha, rena le meloko ya ka moso ga se ra swanela go eke bohwa bjo bja go hlomphega.
tgt_text: ukubungazwa kwabesifazane ukubungazwa kwabesifazane ngokubabandakanya kwezomnothongokubabandakanya kwezomnotho vukuzenzele unnamed ngoncwaba iningizi mu afrika ibungaza inyanga yabesifazane.

tgt_text: labo abanezifo ezibucayi, okumele baye esibhedlela, kumele baqhubeke bahlale endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana izinsuku eziyi10, ukusuka sebezizwa ngconywana futhi bengasayidingi ioksijini.

src_text: a re bolokegeng ka moka ga rena vukuzenzele unnamed naga ya gaborena e theošeditšwe go maemotemošo a bobedi mo magatong a rena a leuba la corona virus .
tgt_text: masigcinane siphephile vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu lehlele esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha ekulweni kwethu nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona .

src_text: se se tlile bjalo ka kimollo go maafrika bo rwa ka moka bao ba ilego ba swanela ke go phela ka fase ga dikiletšo tše tiišeleditšwego letsogo dikgweding tše tlhano tša go feta.
tgt_text: lokhu kube njengokukhu luleka kubobonke abantu baseningizimu afrika abesebephila ngaphansi kwemikhawulo enzima izi nyanga eziyisihlanu eze dlule.

src_text: maemo a ke taetšo ya kgatelopele yeo re e dirago go fokotša diphetelo tše diswa le tlalelo dinolofatšing tša rena tša maphelo.
tgt_text: kuluphawu lwenqubeke laphambili esiyenzayo uku nciphisa ukusuleleka okusha kanye nomthamo ezikhu ngweni zethu zezempilo.

src_text: se sengwe ke gore ye ke kgatelopele ye bohlokwa kudu ge re le gare re kalokana le go thomiša ikonomi ya gaborena ka leswa.
tgt_text: futhi kungukuthuthuka okubalulekile kakhulu njengoba siphokophelele ekuqaleni umnotho wethu kabusha.

src_text: eupša e sale ka pela gore re ka keteka.
tgt_text: kodwake kusesekuseni kakhulu ukuthi singajabula.

src_text: re sale ka gare ga leuba la go bolaya leo le tšeerego maphelo a 11 000 ka afrika borwa e le noši.
tgt_text: sisaphila phakathi kwalo mashayabhuqe wobhubhane osuthathe izimpilo zabantu abayizi11 000 eningizimu afrika kuphela nje.

src_text: ka diphe telo tšeo di netefaditšwego tša go feta seripa sa milione, re santše re nale palo ya godimodimo ya bohlano ya diphetelo lefaseng.
tgt_text: ezi gamekweni eziqinisekisiwe ezingaphezu kwesigamu sesigidi, sisahleli esibalweni sesihlanu samanani aphe zulu kakhulu okwesuleleka emhlabeni.

src_text: e bile gape go nale kgonagalo ya go bowa gape ga bolwetši.

src_text: ge eba re nyaka seo se ka re gopotšago gabotse ka bohlokwa ba go ntšha mahlo dinameng, re swanetše go lebelela ditiragalo tše hlagi lego malobanyana dikhilo mithara tše diketeteke kgole le rena go la new zealand.
tgt_text: uma kwenzeka sidinga into ezosikhumbuza isidingo sokuthi siqaphelisise, kumele sibheke izigameko zaka muva ezenzeke endaweni engamakhilomitha ayizinku lungwane enew zealand.

src_text: dikgwedi tše tharo go tloga nakong ya ge naga yeo e tsebagaditšwe gore ga e na coronavirus , new zealand e tswaletše naga ka bophara gapegape.
tgt_text: ezinyangeni ezintathu emva kokumemezela izwe njenge lingasenalo igciwane lecorona, inew zealand isiphinde yaba ngaphansi kokuvalwa kwezwe.

src_text: le ge e le gore go phulega ga diphetelo tšeo tša moragorago di be di se kaalo, mmušo o ile wa nanoga wa phethagatša gape dikiletšo tša go tswalelwa ga naga.
tgt_text: yize ukuqubuka kwegciwane kwakamuva kwaba nezigameko ezimba lwa, uhulumeni waphinde wabeka imikhawulo yoku valwa kwezwe ngokupha zima kweso.

src_text: dikiletšo tša go swana le tše di ile tša swanela ke go phethagatšwa ka leswa di karolong tše ntši tša yuropa ge naga ye e itemogela le photo la bobedi la diphetelo.
tgt_text: imikhawulo efanayo kumele ukuthi iphinde ibekwe ezingxenyeni ezini ngi zaseyurophu njengo ba bebhekane ‘nehlandla lesibili’ lokusuleleka.

src_text: maitemogelo a a laetša ka fao dilo di ka fetogago ka lebelo ge go bolelwa ka covid19 .
tgt_text: lezi zigameko zibonisa ukuthi izinto zingaguquka kanjani ngokuphazima nje kweso ngenxa yecovid19 .

src_text: se ke segopotšo go mang goba mang magareng ga rena yo a ka bego a na le kgopolo ye fošagetšego ya gore re kgauswi le go bona mafelelo a seemo sa mohuta wo se se mpe sa tšhoganyetšo maphelong a bohle.
tgt_text: kuyisixwayiso kunoma ngubani phakathi kwethu ongaphupha emini ukuthi selidumela emansumpeni ekuboneni isiphetho saloku kufa kwempilo yomphakathi ephuthumayo.

src_text: go ya nneteng, go nale dika tša go re tlišetša tshepho.
tgt_text: nomakanjani, ikhona inhla nsi yethemba elokozayo.

src_text: palo ya diphetelo tše diswa tšeo di netefaditšwego mo afrika borwa e tšwelapele go theoga.
tgt_text: inani lezigameko ezintsha eziqinisekisiwe eningizimu afrika liyaqhubeka nokwe hla.

src_text: nakong ya ge bolwetši bjo bo nyologetše godimodimo, re be re gatiša diphetelo tše diswa tša go balelwa 12 000 ka letšatši.
tgt_text: esicongweni sesifo enya ngeni eyodwa eyedlule, inani lezigameko eziqinise kisiwe ezintsha beliyizi12 000 ngosuku.

src_text: palo ye e theogetše fase go fihla palogare ya go balelwa 5 000 ka letšatši bekeng ya go feta.
tgt_text: lokhu sekwe hle kwaya esilinganisweni esiphakathi esiyizi5 000 ngosuku evikini eledlule.

src_text: palo ya rena ya bao ba fodilego ke 80%.
tgt_text: izinga lethu lokululama lime kumaphesenti angama80.

src_text: ge naga e theošetšwa go maemotemošo a bbedi, dikiletšo tše ntši ka ditira galo tša leago le tša ikonomi di fedišitšwe.
tgt_text: njengoba izwe lehlela esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha, imikhawulo eminingi kwe zenhlalo nakwezomnotho isi susiwe.

src_text: eupša se se tsamaišana le kotsi yeo e hlatlogilego ya diphetelo.
tgt_text: lokhu kuza nobungo zi obukhulu bokusuleleka.

src_text: go nyakega gore gabjale re laole kotsi ye le go netefatša gore diphenyo tšeo re di fihleletšego go fihla ka nako ye tša go bea phatlalalo ya leuba le ka fase ga taolo ga di bušetšwe morago.
tgt_text: manje sekumele silawule ubungozi futhi siqinisekise ukuthi esesikuzuzile kuze kube manje ekubambeze leni ukubhebhetheka kobhu bhane akubuyeli emuva.

src_text: kotsi ye kgolokgolo maphelong a setšhaba ka nako ye ke go iketla kudu.
tgt_text: ubungozi obulengele impilo yesizwe njengamanje ukwe qiwa injabulo bese sikhohlwa ubungozi.

src_text: re a tseba gore gabjale re dumeletšwe go kopana le bagwera le ba malapa a rena, go etela mafelo a boithabišo, go tšea maeto a boiketlo le go nwa mabjala ka diresturenteng, dipareng le ka dithabeneng.
tgt_text: kungenzeka ukuthi manje sesivumelekile ukuhlangana nabangani nomndeni, ukuvakashela izindawo zokuzijabulisa, ukuthatha uhambo kuyonce belekwa nokuphuza utshwa la ezindaweni zokudlela, ezindaweni zokuphuzela utshwala nasemathaveni.

src_text: eupša mmolelwana wa segologolo o re seo o se kgo nago ga go re o se dire.
tgt_text: kodwa njengesisho saku dala esithi, ukuthi unga kwazi ukwenza into, lokho akusho ukuthi kumele uye nze.

src_text: batho ba bantši ba go ba le coronavirus ga ba laetše dika tša bolwetši ebile le bona ba kaba ba sa tsebe gore ba fetetšwe.
tgt_text: abantu abaningi abahaqwe igciwane lecorona abanazo izimpawu futhi kungenzeka bangazi nakwazi ukuthi ba sulelekile.

src_text: ye ke nnete ya se bele ya go se leše di wela ka gobane e ra gore wo mongwe le wo mongwe wa rena a ka be a fetetšwe ka nako ye ebile a ka fetetša ba bangwe e se ka maikemišetšo.
tgt_text: leli iqiniso eli hlasimulisa umzimba ngoba lokhu kusho ukuthi noma ngubani kithina kungenzeka usulelekile njengamanje futhi kungenzeka usulele abanye ngokungenhloso.

src_text: se se diragala kudu ge go etelwa meloko, kudukudu batšofadi le bao ba nago le malwetši a mangwe ao a bego a le gona mebeleng ya bona ao a ba dirago gore ba be kotsing ya go fetelwa.
tgt_text: kuzoba njalo uma ku vakashelwa izihlobo, ikakhu lukazi abantu asebekhulile kanye nalabo abanezifo ezi ngamahlalakhona ezibenza babe buthakathaka ekwe sulelekeni.

src_text: nnete ke gore se se diragala gape ge batho ba e ya diko panong tša sedumedi goba ditiragalong tša setšo.
tgt_text: futhi kuliqiniso uma kuthanyelwa izinkonzo noma imicimbi yamasiko.

src_text: lephoto la bobedi la diphe telo leo dinaga tše dingwe tše ntši di itemogetšego lona ke kgonagalo yeo e dulago e le gona le ka mo nageng ya rena.
tgt_text: ‘ihlandla lesibili’ lokwe suleleka amanye amazwe amaningi abhekene nalo into ehlezi ingenzeka na kuthina.

src_text: le ge e le gore tše ntši tša dikiletšo di fedišitšwe, ga go re gore di ka se boye gape ge go ka direga gore re itemogele tlhatlogo ye kgolo ya diphetelo.
tgt_text: yize imikhawulo eminingi seyisusiwe, lokhu akusho ukuthi ngeke iphinde ibuyiswe uma kungenzeka sibhekane nokukhuphuka kokusuleleka.

src_text: leuba le ke taba ya lehu le bophelo.
tgt_text: lolu bhu bhane luyisimo sokufa noku phila.

src_text: re swanetše go tlwaela seemo ebile re swanetše go ntšha mahlo dinameng.
tgt_text: kumele sivumelane nesimo futhi sidinga ukuthi siqaphelisise.

src_text: mo matšatšing, dibekeng le dikgweding tše tlago, re swanetše gore ka pejana re lebiše šedi ya rena pholong.
tgt_text: ezinsukwini, emavikini nasezinyangeni ezizayo, kumele ngokuphuthumayo sibhekane nemizamo yethu yokululama.

src_text: ikonomi ya rena le setšhaba sa gaborena di tlaišegile kudu.
tgt_text: umnotho wethu nomphakathi wethu bakhahlamezeke kakhulu.

src_text: ge re le gare re boela ditiragalong tša ikonomi go kgabaganya diintasteri tša go lekana tšohle gotee le mošomo wa go lokiša fao go senyegilego, re nale mai karabelo a gore re se lahlele toulo bjalo ka motho ka noši, bjalo ka bengmešomo, bjalo ka setšhaba, bjalo ka malapa, bjalo ka ditsebi, bjalo ka bašomi le bjalo ka badudi.
tgt_text: njengoba sesibuyela emse benzini cishe kuzozonke izimboni – futhi sisebenza ukulungisa umonakalo owenzekile – sinesibophe zelo sokungayekeli uku hlale siqaphile njengomunye nomunye, njengabaqashi, njengomphakathi, njenge mindeni, njengochwephe she, njengabasebenzi kanye nezakhamuzi.

src_text: ga gona le ka o tee wa rena yo a nyakago go boela matšatšing a mathomo a dikiletšo tše bogale tša go tswalelwa ga naga.
tgt_text: akekho kuthina ofuna ukubuyela ezinsukwini ezi dlule zemikhawulo eqinile yokuvalwa kwezwe.

src_text: re nyaka go gatela pele ka maphelo a rena.
tgt_text: sifuna ukuqhubeka nezimpilo zethu.

src_text: re nyaka gore bagwera le baratwa ba rena ba dule ba phetše gabotse ebile ba bolokegile.
tgt_text: sifuna abangani bethu nabathandiweyo bethu bahlale benempilo futhi be phephile.

src_text: bjalo ka setšhaba, a re tšweleng pele go šoma mmogo go netefatša gore re gatela pele.
tgt_text: njengesizwe, asiqhubeke sisebenze ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi siqhubekela phambili.

src_text: go theošetšwa go maemotemošo a bobedi a go tswalelwa ga naga ga go re gore batho ba itirele ka go rata.
tgt_text: ukwehlela esigabeni sesi2 sokuvalwa kwezwe akuyona nje ‘inkululeko kawonkewonke.’ imithetho yokuqhelelana, ukugqokwa kwezifonyo, imibuthano yomphakathi kanye noku vakashela amanye amazwe isamile.

src_text: melao ya go šielana sekgala, go apara maseke, dikgobokano tša leago le maeto a boditšhaba e santše e le gona.
tgt_text: impumelelo yethu ilele ekuthobeleni kwethu le mithethonqubo futhi noku qinisekisa ukuthi omunye nomunye uziphatha ngoku zinakekela nangokuzibo phezela.

src_text: katlego ya rena seemong se e godimo ga bokgoni ba rena ba go latela melao ye beilwego le go netefatša gore re itshwara ka tlhokomelo le ka maikarabelo.
tgt_text: ngaso sonke isikhathi uma sicabanga nanoma isiphi isenzo esingabalulekile, kumele sibuze ukuthi: ibu phi ubungozi bokusuleleka kuthina nakwabanye?

src_text: nako le nako ge re gopola go dira tiragalo ya mohuta ofe goba efe ye sego bohlo kwa, re swanetše go ipotšiša potšišo ye: naa e kaba kotsi ya se ke efe go rena le ba thong ba bangwe?
tgt_text: lapho kukhona khona ubungozi, noma ngabe buncane kanga kanani, kungcono ninga kwenzi.

src_text: fao go nago le kotsi, le ge e kaba ye nnyane ka mokgwa mang, go kaone ge re ka ema ka yona.
tgt_text: asiphokophele phambili, njengakuqala, ngokuqa phela.

src_text: a re gateleng pele, bjalo ka mehla, ka tlhokomelo.
tgt_text: masigcinane siphephile vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu lehlele esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha ekulweni kwethu nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona .

src_text: šireletšang basadi le bana ba rena vukuzenzele unnamed ngwaga wo o feti lego, go nyaka go fihla lehono, diketekete tša basadi, tša banna le bana ba ile ba gwantela palamenteng go tliša ditšhupetšo kgahlanong le bothata bja go katwa le go bolawa ga basadi le bana.
tgt_text: masivikele abesifazane nabantwana bethu vukuzenzele unnamed onyakeni owedlule, osukwini oluseduze nje, izinku lungwane zabesifazane, amadoda kanye nabantwana bamashela ephalamende ukuyobhikishela ukulwisana nesihlava sokudlwengulwa kanye nokubulawa kwabesifazane namantombazane.

src_text: ka nako yeo, setšhaba se be se sa tšhošitšwe ke go bolawa ga uyinene mrwetyana, leighandre jegels, jesse hess le ga basadi ba bangwe ba bantši bao ba lahlegetšwego ke maphelo a bona ka diatleng tša banna ba bašoro.
